duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the attending physician in the care and management of patients in the assigned unit or department.
Contribute to decisions for daily care, write orders, interact with consultants, and facilitate scheduling of tests and procedures.
Make frequent bedside visits to assess patient status and direct care accordingly.
Perform diagnostic and therapeutic healthcare activities under supervision of an attending physician.
Coordinate lab tests, diagnostic studies, prescribe medications, and provide patient assistance and education.
Share call hours, provide phone coverage, and see admitted patients within the hospital.
